00018 #ifndef _topologymap_H
00019 #define _topologymap_H
00020 
00021 #include "map.h"

00024 
00025 namespace votca { namespace csg {
00026 using namespace votca::tools;
00027 
00028 using namespace std;
00029 
00030 class TopologyMap 
00031 {
00032 public:
00033     ~TopologyMap();
00034     
00035     TopologyMap(Topology *in, Topology *out);
00036     
00037     void AddMoleculeMap(Map *map);
00038 
00039     void Apply();
00040     
00041 private:
00042     Topology *_in;
00043     Topology *_out;
00044     
00045     typedef vector<Map *> MapContainer;
00046     MapContainer _maps;
00047 };
00048 
00049 inline TopologyMap::TopologyMap(Topology *in, Topology *out)
00050     : _in(in), _out(out) {}
00051     
00052 inline void TopologyMap::AddMoleculeMap(Map *map)
00053 {
00054         _maps.push_back(map);
00055 }
00056 
00057 }}
